active_target.name: active_target
active_target.tooltip: This can currently be selected in the 3D view

inactive.name: inactive
inactive.tooltip: Click to enable selection in the 3D view

callback_with_context.context_function_id: DoIf( Components.IsNotInInactiveState, Do( DoIfElse( RitualContext.Key == "wh3_dlc27_ritual_nor_throgg_units_level_6", Do(Perform), Do(TargettingContext.PerformAction, TargettingContext.EnableTargetting(false)) ), Component("dlc27_nor_call_up_the_trolls_targeting_menu").TriggerAnimation("Hide") ) )

#For the last tier ritual we spawn a transported army on all forces, instead of selecting one to spawn the transported army to# DoIf( RitualContext.Key != "wh3_dlc27_ritual_nor_throgg_units_level_6", Do(RitualInteractionContext.ClearTarget, RitualInteractionContext.EnableTargetting(true)) )

#hide it when regular-selecting a character on the campaign map# Do( Component("dlc27_nor_call_up_the_trolls_targeting_menu").TriggerAnimation("Hide"), DoIf( RitualContext.Key != "wh3_dlc27_ritual_nor_throgg_units_level_6", Do(RitualInteractionContext.ClearTarget, RitualInteractionContext.EnableTargetting(false)) ) )

GetIfElse( RitualContext.Key == "wh3_dlc27_ritual_nor_throgg_units_level_6", Loc("wh3_dlc27_call_up_the_trolls_force_target_all_armies"), GetIfElse( IsContextValid(RitualInteractionContext) && IsContextValid(RitualInteractionContext.CurrentTargetContext), Format("%s([[img:%S]][[/img]]%s)", TargettingContext.CurrentTargetContext.Name, TargettingContext.CurrentTargetContext.FactionFlagSmall, TargettingContext.CurrentTargetContext.FactionName), TargetCriteriaText ) )

info_text.comment: used if the text is smaller than the dy_details_slider textview

component_text.text: Survey your forces to select which to bolster with a Troll army.
Unleash the full might of the Monstrous Horde!

newstate.name: NewState
newstate.tooltip: This character or force has available skill points to spend.
